channel.title: Ai on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on Terminal

item.title: AI will teach us to be better humans
item.description: Until recently I worked with a particularly difficult engineer. He fits the sterotype of Silicon Valley psychopath that sees the people around them as disposeable tools to achieve his goals. This person was (and is) very smart, and was one of the early adopters of AI in my environment. Eventually that got him an internal transfer to another more AI-centric position and sailed into the sunset.
